shortdesc.ph: Gets the current beauty effect settings.

p.codeblock: virtual int getFaceShapeBeautyOptions(FaceShapeBeautyOptions& options, agora::media::MEDIA_SOURCE_TYPE type = agora::media::PRIMARY_CAMERA_SOURCE) = 0;

section.p: You can call this method when the user opens the beauty style and intensity menu in the app, and refresh the menu and update the UI based on the returned result.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: When users open the beauty style and intensity menu in the app, you can call this method to get the current beauty options and update the UI accordingly.

plentry.pd: Output parameter representing beauty style options. See .

The media source type for applying filter effects. See . In this method, this parameter only supports the following two settings:
If using the camera to capture local video, use the default value PRIMARY_CAMERA_SOURCE.
If using a custom video source, set this parameter to CUSTOM_VIDEO_SOURCE.

The media source type. See . This parameter only supports the following two settings:
If you use the camera to capture local video, use the default value PRIMARY_CAMERA_SOURCE.
If you use a custom video source, set it to CUSTOM_VIDEO_SOURCE.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: If the method call succeeds, returns a instance. If the method call fails, returns null.
